str2: A trumpet, the sound of a trumpet. Perhaps from salos; a trumpet.
(a) a sound, noise, (b) a rumor, report. Of uncertain affinity; a loud or confused noise, i.e. Roar; figuratively, a rumor.
Probably akin to phaino through the idea of disclosure; a tone; by implication, an address, saying or language.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Feminine Singular

str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From para and the middle voice of aiteo; to beg off, i.e. Deprecate, decline, shun.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
To place (put) to, add; I do again. From pros and tithemi; to place additionally, i.e. Lay beside, annex, repeat.
